box2D.collision.B2AABB

type
class
An axis aligned bounding box.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

lowerBound : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

The lower vertex

upperBound : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

The upper vertex

Instance Methods

combine(aabb1 : B2AABB, aabb2 : B2AABB) : Void

Combine two AABBs into one.

contains(aabb : B2AABB) : Bool

Is an AABB contained within this one.

getCenter() : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the center of the AABB.

getExtents() : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2

Get the extents of the AABB (half-widths).

isValid() : Bool

Verify that the bounds are sorted.

rayCast(output : B2RayCastOutput, input : B2RayCastInput) : Bool

Perform a precise raycast against the AABB.

testOverlap(other : B2AABB) : Bool

Tests if another AABB overlaps this one.
